objection_patterns.name: DoubleMoveWorry
response_playbook: Acknowledge: Coordinating the sale and purchase is the #1 concern for sellers who are also buying
Offer: We have three solutions: bridge loan, rent-back agreement, or contingent offer strategy
Action: Let me show you how we've helped clients avoid the double move

objection_patterns.name: PrepCosts
response_playbook: Acknowledge: I understand you don't want to pour money into a home you're leaving
Reframe: Strategic prep typically returns 3-5X in sale price - but let's be smart about it
Offer: I have a concierge program - we front the prep costs and you pay at closing

objection_patterns.name: PricingDisagreement
response_playbook: Acknowledge: I totally understand - you know your home's value and what you've put into it
Educate: Let me show you the data - recent comps, days on market, and current buyer behavior
Offer: How about we list at your number but with a 30-day price adjustment strategy if needed?

objection_patterns.name: TimingPressure
response_playbook: Acknowledge: Time pressure is real and we need a plan that gets you results quickly
Offer: I can guarantee we'll have an offer over list price in less than 30 days with our aggressive marketing
Action: Let's put together a tight timeline and hit every deadline

objection_patterns.name: FindingRightProperty
response_playbook: Acknowledge: Inventory is definitely tight for the type of home you're looking for
Reframe: I have off-market opportunities and pre-market listings for my VIP clients
Action: Let's get you set up in the VIP program so you see homes before they hit the market

objection_patterns.name: CommissionConcern
response_playbook: Acknowledge: I understand you want to maximize your net proceeds
Reframe: My full-service marketing gets you 5-10% higher sale price, which more than covers the commission
Offer: Let me show you the net sheet comparing discount vs full-service results

knowledge_snippets: Bridge loan: Short-term financing that lets you buy before selling - typically 6-12 months
Rent-back agreement: Seller stays in home as renter for 30-60 days post-closing
Concierge prep programs: Agent advances money for staging/repairs, paid back at closing
